			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/cooperative/area_of_operations" nodeset="/data/cooperative/area_of_operations" type="xsd:string" vellum:relevant="selected(#form/cooperative/update_cooperative, 'operations')" relevant="selected(/data/cooperative/update_cooperative, 'operations')" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/cooperative/meeting_frequency" nodeset="/data/cooperative/meeting_frequency" vellum:relevant="selected(#form/cooperative/update_cooperative, 'meeting_frequency')" relevant="selected(/data/cooperative/update_cooperative, 'meeting_frequency')" required="true()" />

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Remove Farmer</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/21CF2F64-C36B-437E-B3D8-ACA9ED65D005" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Remove Farmer">
					<farmer_name />
					<farmer_phone_number />
					<farmer_enrollment_year />
					<farmer_location />
					<remove_farmer />
					<confirm_close />
					<not_removed_confirm />
				</data>
			</instance>
			<instance id="casedb" src="jr://instance/casedb" />
			<instance src="jr://instance/session" id="commcaresession" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer_name" nodeset="/data/farmer_name" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer_phone_number" nodeset="/data/farmer_phone_number" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer_enrollment_year" nodeset="/data/farmer_enrollment_year" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer_location" nodeset="/data/farmer_location" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/remove_farmer" nodeset="/data/remove_farmer" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/confirm_close" nodeset="/data/confirm_close" vellum:relevant="#form/remove_farmer = '1'" relevant="/data/remove_farmer = '1'" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/not_removed_confirm" nodeset="/data/not_removed_confirm" vellum:relevant="#form/remove_farmer = '2'" relevant="/data/remove_farmer = '2'" />
			<setvalue event="xforms-ready" vellum:ref="#form/farmer_name" ref="/data/farmer_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name" value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" />
			<setvalue event="xforms-ready" vellum:ref="#form/farmer_phone_number" ref="/data/farmer_phone_number" vellum:value="#case/farmer_phone_number" value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/farmer_phone_number" />
			<setvalue event="xforms-ready" vellum:ref="#form/farmer_enrollment_year" ref="/data/farmer_enrollment_year" vellum:value="#case/member_since" value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/member_since" />
			<setvalue event="xforms-ready" vellum:ref="#form/farmer_location" ref="/data/farmer_location" vellum:value="#case/farmer_address" value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/farmer_address" />
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="remove_farmer-label">
						<value>Would you like to remove <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name" /> from the cooperative?</value>
						<value form="markdown">Would you like to remove <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name" /> from the cooperative?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="remove_farmer-1-label">
						<value>Yes</value>
					</text>
					<text id="remove_farmer-2-label">
						<value>No</value>
					</text>
					<text id="confirm_close-label">
						<value><output value="/data/farmer_name" vellum:value="#form/farmer_name" />  will be removed once you submit this form.</value>
					</text>
					<text id="not_removed_confirm-label">
						<value>Please exit this form. <output value="/data/farmer_name" vellum:value="#form/farmer_name" /> will NOT be removed.</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
		<vellum:hashtags>{"#case/case_name":null,"#case/farmer_phone_number":null,"#case/member_since":null,"#case/farmer_address":null}</vellum:hashtags>
		<vellum:hashtagTransforms>{"prefixes":{"#case/parent/":"instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/index/parent]/","#case/":"instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/"}}</vellum:hashtagTransforms>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<select1 vellum:ref="#form/remove_farmer" ref="/data/remove_farmer">
			<label ref="jr:itext('remove_farmer-label')" />
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('remove_farmer-1-label')" />
				<value>1</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('remove_farmer-2-label')" />
				<value>2</value>
			</item>
		</select1>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/confirm_close" ref="/data/confirm_close" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('confirm_close-label')" />
		</trigger>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/not_removed_confirm" ref="/data/not_removed_confirm" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('not_removed_confirm-label')" />
		</trigger>
	</h:body>
</h:html>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Enroll Farmers in Cooperative</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/52D111C9-79C6-403F-BF4C-D24B64A872E2" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Enroll Farmers in Cooperative">
					<enrollment_number />
					<farmer jr:template="">
						<intro>
							<farmer_label />
							<enrollment />
						</intro>
						<farmer_name>
							<first_name />
							<last_name />
							<farmer_full_name />
						</farmer_name>
						<demographic_data>
							<farmer_phone_number />
							<farmer_sex />
							<farmer_age />
							<member_since />
							<farmer_address />
						</demographic_data>
						<crops />
						<corn_farmer />
						<rice_farmer />
						<other_farmer />
						<land_use>
							<land_ownership />
							<arable_land_own />
							<arable_land_rent />
							<total_arable_land />
							<land_access />
						</land_use>
					</farmer>
					<output_thankyou />
				</data>
			</instance>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/enrollment_number" nodeset="/data/enrollment_number" type="xsd:int" required="true()" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer" nodeset="/data/farmer" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/intro" nodeset="/data/farmer/intro" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/intro/farmer_label" nodeset="/data/farmer/intro/farmer_label" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/intro/enrollment" nodeset="/data/farmer/intro/enrollment" required="true()" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/farmer_name" nodeset="/data/farmer/farmer_name" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/farmer_name/first_name" nodeset="/data/farmer/farmer_name/first_name" type="xsd:string" required="true()" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/farmer_name/last_name" nodeset="/data/farmer/farmer_name/last_name" type="xsd:string" required="true()" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/farmer_name/farmer_full_name" nodeset="/data/farmer/farmer_name/farmer_full_name" vellum:calculate="concat(#form/farmer/farmer_name/first_name, ' ', #form/farmer/farmer_name/last_name)" calculate="concat(/data/farmer/farmer_name/first_name, ' ', /data/farmer/farmer_name/last_name)" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/demographic_data" nodeset="/data/farmer/demographic_data" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/demographic_data/farmer_phone_number" nodeset="/data/farmer/demographic_data/farmer_phone_number" type="xsd:string" constraint="string-length(.) = 10" jr:constraintMsg="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data/farmer_phone_number-constraintMsg')" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/demographic_data/farmer_sex" nodeset="/data/farmer/demographic_data/farmer_sex" required="true()" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/demographic_data/farmer_age" nodeset="/data/farmer/demographic_data/farmer_age" type="xsd:int" constraint=". >= 15 and . <= 100" jr:constraintMsg="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data/farmer_age-constraintMsg')" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/demographic_data/member_since" nodeset="/data/farmer/demographic_data/member_since" type="xsd:int" constraint=". > 1950 and . <= 2016" jr:constraintMsg="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data/member_since-constraintMsg')" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/demographic_data/farmer_address" nodeset="/data/farmer/demographic_data/farmer_address" type="xsd:string" required="true()" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/crops" nodeset="/data/farmer/crops" required="true()" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/corn_farmer" nodeset="/data/farmer/corn_farmer" vellum:calculate="if(selected(#form/farmer/crops, "corn"), 1, 0)" calculate="if(selected(/data/farmer/crops, "corn"), 1, 0)" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/rice_farmer" nodeset="/data/farmer/rice_farmer" vellum:calculate="if(selected(#form/farmer/crops, "rice"), 1, 0)" calculate="if(selected(/data/farmer/crops, "rice"), 1, 0)" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/other_farmer" nodeset="/data/farmer/other_farmer" vellum:calculate="if(selected(#form/farmer/crops, "other"), 1, 0)" calculate="if(selected(/data/farmer/crops, "other"), 1, 0)" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/land_use" nodeset="/data/farmer/land_use" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/land_use/land_ownership" nodeset="/data/farmer/land_use/land_ownership" required="true()" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/land_use/arable_land_own" nodeset="/data/farmer/land_use/arable_land_own" type="xsd:double" vellum:relevant="#form/farmer/land_use/land_ownership = '1'" relevant="/data/farmer/land_use/land_ownership = '1'" required="true()" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/land_use/arable_land_rent" nodeset="/data/farmer/land_use/arable_land_rent" type="xsd:double" vellum:relevant="#form/farmer/land_use/land_ownership = '2'" relevant="/data/farmer/land_use/land_ownership = '2'" required="true()" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/land_use/total_arable_land" nodeset="/data/farmer/land_use/total_arable_land" vellum:calculate="if(#form/farmer/land_use/arable_land_own = "", #form/farmer/land_use/arable_land_rent, #form/farmer/land_use/arable_land_own)" calculate="if(/data/farmer/land_use/arable_land_own = "", /data/farmer/land_use/arable_land_rent, /data/farmer/land_use/arable_land_own)" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer/land_use/land_access" nodeset="/data/farmer/land_use/land_access" vellum:relevant="#form/farmer/land_use/land_ownership = '2'" relevant="/data/farmer/land_use/land_ownership = '2'" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/output_thankyou" nodeset="/data/output_thankyou" vellum:relevant="count(/data/farmer[#form/farmer/land_use/total_arable_land != '']) = #form/enrollment_number" relevant="count(/data/farmer[/data/farmer/land_use/total_arable_land != '']) = /data/enrollment_number" />
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="enrollment_number-label">
						<value>**How many farmers are you enrolling today?**

*Note: you can submit this form again if new members join your cooperative in the future.*</value>
						<value form="markdown">**How many farmers are you enrolling today?**

*Note: you can submit this form again if new members join your cooperative in the future.*</value>
					</text>
					<text id="farmer-label">
						<value>Farmer Enrollment</value>
					</text>
					<text id="farmer/intro-label">
						<value>Overview</value>
					</text>

	<h:body>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/enrollment_number" ref="/data/enrollment_number">
			<label ref="jr:itext('enrollment_number-label')" />
		</input>
		<group>
			<label ref="jr:itext('farmer-label')" />
			<repeat vellum:jr__count="#form/enrollment_number" jr:count="/data/enrollment_number" jr:noAddRemove="true()" vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer" nodeset="/data/farmer">
				<group vellum:ref="#form/farmer/intro" ref="/data/farmer/intro" appearance="field-list">
					<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/intro-label')" />
					<trigger vellum:ref="#form/farmer/intro/farmer_label" ref="/data/farmer/intro/farmer_label" appearance="minimal">
						<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/intro/farmer_label-label')" />
					</trigger>
					<select1 vellum:ref="#form/farmer/intro/enrollment" ref="/data/farmer/intro/enrollment">
						<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/intro/enrollment-label')" />
						<item>
							<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/intro/enrollment-1-label')" />
							<value>1</value>
						</item>
						<item>
							<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/intro/enrollment-2-label')" />
							<value>2</value>
						</item>
					</select1>
				</group>
				<group vellum:ref="#form/farmer/farmer_name" ref="/data/farmer/farmer_name" appearance="field-list">
					<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/farmer_name-label')" />
					<input vellum:ref="#form/farmer/farmer_name/first_name" ref="/data/farmer/farmer_name/first_name">
						<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/farmer_name/first_name-label')" />
					</input>
					<input vellum:ref="#form/farmer/farmer_name/last_name" ref="/data/farmer/farmer_name/last_name">
						<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/farmer_name/last_name-label')" />
					</input>
				</group>
				<group vellum:ref="#form/farmer/demographic_data" ref="/data/farmer/demographic_data">
					<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data-label')" />
					<input vellum:ref="#form/farmer/demographic_data/farmer_phone_number" ref="/data/farmer/demographic_data/farmer_phone_number" appearance="numeric">
						<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data/farmer_phone_number-label')" />
						<alert ref="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data/farmer_phone_number-constraintMsg')" />
					</input>
					<select1 vellum:ref="#form/farmer/demographic_data/farmer_sex" ref="/data/farmer/demographic_data/farmer_sex">
						<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data/farmer_sex-label')" />
						<item>
							<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data/farmer_sex-male-label')" />
							<value>male</value>
						</item>
						<item>
							<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data/farmer_sex-female-label')" />
							<value>female</value>
						</item>
						<item>
							<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data/farmer_sex-non_binary-label')" />
							<value>non_binary</value>
						</item>
					</select1>
					<input vellum:ref="#form/farmer/demographic_data/farmer_age" ref="/data/farmer/demographic_data/farmer_age">
						<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data/farmer_age-label')" />
						<alert ref="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data/farmer_age-constraintMsg')" />
					</input>
					<input vellum:ref="#form/farmer/demographic_data/member_since" ref="/data/farmer/demographic_data/member_since">
						<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data/member_since-label')" />
						<alert ref="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data/member_since-constraintMsg')" />
					</input>
					<input vellum:ref="#form/farmer/demographic_data/farmer_address" ref="/data/farmer/demographic_data/farmer_address">
						<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data/farmer_address-label')" />
					</input>
				</group>
				<select vellum:ref="#form/farmer/crops" ref="/data/farmer/crops">
					<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/crops-label')" />
					<item>
						<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/crops-rice-label')" />
						<value>rice</value>
					</item>
					<item>
						<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/crops-corn-label')" />
						<value>corn</value>
					</item>
					<item>
						<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/crops-other-label')" />
						<value>other</value>
					</item>
				</select>
				<group vellum:ref="#form/farmer/land_use" ref="/data/farmer/land_use">
					<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/land_use-label')" />
					<select1 vellum:ref="#form/farmer/land_use/land_ownership" ref="/data/farmer/land_use/land_ownership">
						<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/land_use/land_ownership-label')" />
						<item>
							<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/land_use/land_ownership-1-label')" />
							<value>1</value>
						</item>
						<item>
							<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/land_use/land_ownership-2-label')" />
							<value>2</value>
						</item>
					</select1>
					<input vellum:ref="#form/farmer/land_use/arable_land_own" ref="/data/farmer/land_use/arable_land_own">
						<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/land_use/arable_land_own-label')" />
						<hint ref="jr:itext('farmer/land_use/arable_land_own-hint')" />
					</input>
					<input vellum:ref="#form/farmer/land_use/arable_land_rent" ref="/data/farmer/land_use/arable_land_rent">
						<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/land_use/arable_land_rent-label')" />
						<hint ref="jr:itext('farmer/land_use/arable_land_rent-hint')" />
					</input>
					<select1 vellum:ref="#form/farmer/land_use/land_access" ref="/data/farmer/land_use/land_access">
						<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/land_use/land_access-label')" />
						<item>
							<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/land_use/land_access-1-label')" />
							<value>1</value>
						</item>
						<item>
							<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/land_use/land_access-2-label')" />
							<value>2</value>
						</item>
						<item>
							<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/land_use/land_access-3-label')" />
							<value>3</value>
						</item>
						<item>
							<label ref="jr:itext('farmer/land_use/land_access-4-label')" />
							<value>4</value>
						</item>
					</select1>
				</group>
			</repeat>
		</group>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/output_thankyou" ref="/data/output_thankyou" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('output_thankyou-label')" />
		</trigger>
	</h:body>
</h:html>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Farmer Report</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/247A9D18-3627-477A-809F-915036A23E05" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Farmer Report">
					<reporting_properties>
						<crop_yield_corn />
						<crop_yield_rice />
						<number_of_crops />
						<estimate_harvest_date />
						<actual_harvest_date />
						<arable_land_hectares />
						<crop_earnings_rice />
						<price_rice />
						<rice_yield />
					</reporting_properties>
					<report_group>
						<question17>
							<cooperative_membership />
							<cooperative_membership_unknown />
							<arable_land_arable_land />
							<copy-1-of-arable_land_arable_land />
							<harvest_plans__estimate_harvest_date_estimate_harvest_date__actual_harvest_ />
							<harvest_plans_there_is_no_recorded_information_for_case_names_harvest_plann />
						</question17>
						<Rice_report_group_label>
							<label_crop_yield_rice />
							<label_crop_yield_rice_unknown />
							<label_crop_earnings_rice />
							<label_crop_earnings_rice_unknown />
						</Rice_report_group_label>
						<Corn_report_group_label>
							<label_crop_yield_corn />
							<label_crop_yield_corn_unknown />
							<label_crop_price_corn />
							<label_crop_price_corn_unknown />
						</Corn_report_group_label>
						<group_update_farming_info>
							<farmer_still_growing />
						</group_update_farming_info>
					</report_group>
				</data>
			</instance>
			<instance id="casedb" src="jr://instance/casedb" />
			<instance src="jr://instance/session" id="commcaresession" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/reporting_properties" nodeset="/data/reporting_properties" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/reporting_properties/crop_yield_corn" nodeset="/data/reporting_properties/crop_yield_corn" vellum:calculate="#case/corn_yield_per_hectacre" calculate="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/corn_yield_per_hectacre" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/reporting_properties/crop_yield_rice" nodeset="/data/reporting_properties/crop_yield_rice" vellum:calculate="#case/rice_yield_per_hectacre" calculate="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/rice_yield_per_hectacre" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/reporting_properties/number_of_crops" nodeset="/data/reporting_properties/number_of_crops" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/reporting_properties/estimate_harvest_date" nodeset="/data/reporting_properties/estimate_harvest_date" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/reporting_properties/actual_harvest_date" nodeset="/data/reporting_properties/actual_harvest_date" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/reporting_properties/arable_land_hectares" nodeset="/data/reporting_properties/arable_land_hectares" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/reporting_properties/crop_earnings_rice" nodeset="/data/reporting_properties/crop_earnings_rice" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/reporting_properties/price_rice" nodeset="/data/reporting_properties/price_rice" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/reporting_properties/rice_yield" nodeset="/data/reporting_properties/rice_yield" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/report_group" nodeset="/data/report_group" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/report_group/question17" nodeset="/data/report_group/question17" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/report_group/question17/cooperative_membership" nodeset="/data/report_group/question17/cooperative_membership" vellum:relevant="#case/parent/case_name != ''" relevant="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/index/parent]/case_name != ''" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/report_group/question17/cooperative_membership_unknown" nodeset="/data/report_group/question17/cooperative_membership_unknown" vellum:relevant="#case/parent/case_name = ''" relevant="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/index/parent]/case_name = ''" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/report_group/question17/arable_land_arable_land" nodeset="/data/report_group/question17/arable_land_arable_land" vellum:relevant="#case/arable_land != ''" relevant="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/arable_land != ''" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/report_group/question17/copy-1-of-arable_land_arable_land" nodeset="/data/report_group/question17/copy-1-of-arable_land_arable_land" vellum:relevant="#case/arable_land = ''" relevant="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/arable_land = ''" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/report_group/question17/harvest_plans__estimate_harvest_date_estimate_harvest_date__actual_harvest_" nodeset="/data/report_group/question17/harvest_plans__estimate_harvest_date_estimate_harvest_date__actual_harvest_" vellum:relevant="#case/estimate_harvest_date != '' or #case/actual_harvest_date != ''" relevant="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/estimate_harvest_date != '' or instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/actual_harvest_date != ''" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/report_group/question17/harvest_plans_there_is_no_recorded_information_for_case_names_harvest_plann" nodeset="/data/report_group/question17/harvest_plans_there_is_no_recorded_information_for_case_names_harvest_plann" vellum:relevant="#case/estimate_harvest_date = '' and #case/actual_harvest_date = ''" relevant="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/estimate_harvest_date = '' and instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/actual_harvest_date = ''" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/report_group/Rice_report_group_label" nodeset="/data/report_group/Rice_report_group_label" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/report_group/Rice_report_group_label/label_crop_yield_rice" nodeset="/data/report_group/Rice_report_group_label/label_crop_yield_rice" vellum:relevant="#case/rice_yield_weight != ''" relevant="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/rice_yield_weight != ''" />

<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">

			<bind nodeset="/data/reporting_properties/label_sales_to_date"/>
			<bind nodeset="/data/reporting_properties/label_crop_yield_rice"/>
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="reporting_properties-label">
						<value>reporting_properties</value></text>
					<text id="reporting_properties/corn_farmer-label">
						<value>Is this farmer still growing corn?</value></text>
					<text id="reporting_properties/corn_farmer-1-label">
						<value>Yes</value></text>
					<text id="reporting_properties/corn_farmer-2-label">
						<value>No</value></text>
					<text id="reporting_properties/label_crop_yield_corn-label">

					<text id="reporting_properties/label_sales_to_date-label">
						<value>Dollars Earned from Corn Harvest</value></text>
					<text id="reporting_properties/label_crop_yield_rice-label">
						<value>label_crop_yield_rice</value></text>

			<translation lang="fra">

						<value>reporting_properties</value></text>
					<text id="reporting_properties/corn_farmer-label">
						<value>Cet agriculteur, cultive-t-il toujours du maïs?</value></text>

					<text id="reporting_properties/corn_farmer-2-label">
						<value>Non</value></text>
					<text id="reporting_properties/label_crop_yield_corn-label">

					<text id="reporting_properties/label_crop_yield_rice-label">
						<value>label_crop_yield_rice</value></text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		<setvalue event="xforms-ready" ref="/data/reporting_properties/estimate_harvest_date" value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/estimate_harvest_date"/><setvalue event="xforms-ready" ref="/data/reporting_properties/crop_yield_corn" value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/corn_yield_per_hectacre"/><setvalue event="xforms-ready" ref="/data/reporting_properties/corn_farmer_status" value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/corn_farmer"/><setvalue event="xforms-ready" ref="/data/reporting_properties/price_corn" value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/price_corn_per_bushel"/><setvalue event="xforms-ready" ref="/data/reporting_properties/arable_land_hectares" value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/arable_hectares_corn"/><setvalue event="xforms-ready" ref="/data/reporting_properties/actual_harvest_date" value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/actual_harvest_date"/></model>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<group ref="/data/reporting_properties">
			<label ref="jr:itext('reporting_properties-label')"/>
			<select1 ref="/data/reporting_properties/corn_farmer">
				<label ref="jr:itext('reporting_properties/corn_farmer-label')"/>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('reporting_properties/corn_farmer-1-label')"/>
					<value>1</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('reporting_properties/corn_farmer-2-label')"/>
					<value>2</value>
				</item>
			</select1>
			<trigger ref="/data/reporting_properties/label_crop_yield_corn" appearance="minimal">
				<label ref="jr:itext('reporting_properties/label_crop_yield_corn-label')"/>
			</trigger>
			<trigger ref="/data/reporting_properties/label_sales_to_date" appearance="minimal">
				<label ref="jr:itext('reporting_properties/label_sales_to_date-label')"/>
			</trigger>
			<trigger ref="/data/reporting_properties/label_crop_yield_rice" appearance="minimal">
				<label ref="jr:itext('reporting_properties/label_crop_yield_rice-label')"/>
			</trigger>
		</group>
	</h:body>
</h:html>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Pre-Harvest Visit</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/3B84A095-8DB1-44EB-B082-CB4A1522CD39" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Pre-Harvest Visit">
					<load_reporting_properties>
						<number_of_crops />
						<cooperative_crops />
						<estimate_harvest_date />
						<actual_harvest_date />
						<arable_land_hectares />
						<rice>
							<farmer_crop_earnings_rice />
							<coop_crop_yield_rice_actual />
							<farmer_estimate_yield_rice />
							<farmer_actual_yield_rice />
							<farmer_crop_yield_weight_rice />
						</rice>
						<corn>
							<farmer_crop_earnings_corn />
							<coop_crop_yield_corn_actual />
							<farmer_estimated_yield_corn />
							<farmer_actual_yield_corn />
							<farmer_crop_yield_weight_corn />
						</corn>
					</load_reporting_properties>
					<case_properties>
						<farmer_name />
						<farmer_phone_number />
						<farmer_sex />
						<farmer_age />
						<farmer_address />
						<farmer_land_use />
						<visit_number />
						<new_visit_number />
						<previous_land_plot_size />
						<corn_farmer />
						<rice_farmer />
						<other_farmer />
					</case_properties>
					<supervision>
						<date />
						<arable_hectares_overwrite />
						<crops />
						<corn_farmer />
						<rice_farmer />
						<other_farmer />
						<crops_other />
						<crops_per_arable_hectares>
							<output />
							<rice />
							<corn />
							<other />
						</crops_per_arable_hectares>
					</supervision>
					<preharvest_planning>
						<harvest_month />
						<harvest_year />
						<next_visit_date />
						<complete_output />
						<harvest_month_math />
						<harvest_year_math />
						<expected_harvest_date />
						<days_to_harvest />
						<expected_rice_yield />
						<expected_corn_yield />
					</preharvest_planning>
				</data>
			</instance>
			<instance id="casedb" src="jr://instance/casedb" />
			<instance src="jr://instance/session" id="commcaresession" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/load_reporting_properties" nodeset="/data/load_reporting_properties" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/load_reporting_properties/number_of_crops" nodeset="/data/load_reporting_properties/number_of_crops" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/load_reporting_properties/cooperative_crops" nodeset="/data/load_reporting_properties/cooperative_crops" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/load_reporting_properties/estimate_harvest_date" nodeset="/data/load_reporting_properties/estimate_harvest_date" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/load_reporting_properties/actual_harvest_date" nodeset="/data/load_reporting_properties/actual_harvest_date" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/load_reporting_properties/arable_land_hectares" nodeset="/data/load_reporting_properties/arable_land_hectares" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/load_reporting_properties/rice" nodeset="/data/load_reporting_properties/rice" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/load_reporting_properties/rice/farmer_crop_earnings_rice" nodeset="/data/load_reporting_properties/rice/farmer_crop_earnings_rice" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/load_reporting_properties/rice/coop_crop_yield_rice_actual" nodeset="/data/load_reporting_properties/rice/coop_crop_yield_rice_actual" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/load_reporting_properties/rice/farmer_estimate_yield_rice" nodeset="/data/load_reporting_properties/rice/farmer_estimate_yield_rice" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/load_reporting_properties/rice/farmer_actual_yield_rice" nodeset="/data/load_reporting_properties/rice/farmer_actual_yield_rice" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/load_reporting_properties/rice/farmer_crop_yield_weight_rice" nodeset="/data/load_reporting_properties/rice/farmer_crop_yield_weight_rice" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/load_reporting_properties/corn" nodeset="/data/load_reporting_properties/corn" />

	<h:body>
		<group vellum:ref="#form/load_reporting_properties" ref="/data/load_reporting_properties">
			<label ref="jr:itext('load_reporting_properties-label')" />
			<group vellum:ref="#form/load_reporting_properties/rice" ref="/data/load_reporting_properties/rice">
				<label ref="jr:itext('load_reporting_properties/rice-label')" />
			</group>
			<group vellum:ref="#form/load_reporting_properties/corn" ref="/data/load_reporting_properties/corn">
				<label ref="jr:itext('load_reporting_properties/corn-label')" />
			</group>
		</group>
		<group vellum:ref="#form/case_properties" ref="/data/case_properties">
			<label ref="jr:itext('case_properties-label')" />
		</group>
		<group vellum:ref="#form/supervision" ref="/data/supervision">
			<input vellum:ref="#form/supervision/date" ref="/data/supervision/date">
				<label ref="jr:itext('supervision/date-label')" />
				<alert ref="jr:itext('supervision/date-constraintMsg')" />
			</input>
			<input vellum:ref="#form/supervision/arable_hectares_overwrite" ref="/data/supervision/arable_hectares_overwrite">
				<label ref="jr:itext('supervision/arable_hectares_overwrite-label')" />
			</input>
			<select vellum:ref="#form/supervision/crops" ref="/data/supervision/crops">
				<label ref="jr:itext('supervision/crops-label')" />
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('supervision/crops-rice-label')" />
					<value>rice</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('supervision/crops-corn-label')" />
					<value>corn</value>
				</item>
			</select>
			<input vellum:ref="#form/supervision/crops_other" ref="/data/supervision/crops_other">
				<label ref="jr:itext('supervision/crops_other-label')" />
			</input>
			<group vellum:ref="#form/supervision/crops_per_arable_hectares" ref="/data/supervision/crops_per_arable_hectares" appearance="field-list">
				<trigger vellum:ref="#form/supervision/crops_per_arable_hectares/output" ref="/data/supervision/crops_per_arable_hectares/output" appearance="minimal">
					<label ref="jr:itext('supervision/crops_per_arable_hectares/output-label')" />
				</trigger>
				<input vellum:ref="#form/supervision/crops_per_arable_hectares/rice" ref="/data/supervision/crops_per_arable_hectares/rice">
					<label ref="jr:itext('supervision/crops_per_arable_hectares/rice-label')" />
					<alert ref="jr:itext('supervision/crops_per_arable_hectares/rice-constraintMsg')" />
				</input>
				<input vellum:ref="#form/supervision/crops_per_arable_hectares/corn" ref="/data/supervision/crops_per_arable_hectares/corn">
					<label ref="jr:itext('supervision/crops_per_arable_hectares/corn-label')" />
					<alert ref="jr:itext('supervision/crops_per_arable_hectares/corn-constraintMsg')" />
				</input>
				<input vellum:ref="#form/supervision/crops_per_arable_hectares/other" ref="/data/supervision/crops_per_arable_hectares/other">
					<label ref="jr:itext('supervision/crops_per_arable_hectares/other-label')" />
				</input>
			</group>
		</group>
		<group vellum:ref="#form/preharvest_planning" ref="/data/preharvest_planning">
			<select1 vellum:ref="#form/preharvest_planning/harvest_month" ref="/data/preharvest_planning/harvest_month">
				<label ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/harvest_month-label')" />
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/harvest_month-01-label')" />
					<value>01</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/harvest_month-02-label')" />
					<value>02</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/harvest_month-03-label')" />
					<value>03</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/harvest_month-04-label')" />
					<value>04</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/harvest_month-05-label')" />
					<value>05</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/harvest_month-06-label')" />
					<value>06</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/harvest_month-07-label')" />
					<value>07</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/harvest_month-08-label')" />
					<value>08</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/harvest_month-09-label')" />
					<value>09</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/harvest_month-10-label')" />
					<value>10</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/harvest_month-11-label')" />
					<value>11</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/harvest_month-12-label')" />
					<value>12</value>
				</item>
			</select1>
			<input vellum:ref="#form/preharvest_planning/harvest_year" ref="/data/preharvest_planning/harvest_year">
				<label ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/harvest_year-label')" />
			</input>
			<input vellum:ref="#form/preharvest_planning/next_visit_date" ref="/data/preharvest_planning/next_visit_date">
				<label ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/next_visit_date-label')" />
				<alert ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/next_visit_date-constraintMsg')" />
			</input>
			<trigger vellum:ref="#form/preharvest_planning/complete_output" ref="/data/preharvest_planning/complete_output" appearance="minimal">
				<label ref="jr:itext('preharvest_planning/complete_output-label')" />
			</trigger>
		</group>
	</h:body>
</h:html>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Update Farmer Information</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/526F2204-0889-4C1A-A1E3-3C623E48A4CC" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Update Farmer Information">
					<case_properties>
						<farmer_full_name />
						<cooperative_name />
						<farmer_gender />
						<farmer_age />
						<farmer_land_ownership />
						<farmer_crops />
						<farmer_phone_number />
						<farm_size />
						<farmer_address />
						<land_ownership />
						<corn_farmer />
						<rice_farmer />
						<other_farmer />
						<cooperative_member_since />
						<arable_land />
					</case_properties>
					<review_label>
						<intro />
						<farmer_full_name />
						<farmer_demographics_label />
						<farmer_age_label />
						<plot_size_label />
						<farmer_cooperative_membership />
						<farmer_crops_label />
					</review_label>
					<update_information />
					<farmer_first_name />
					<farmer_last_name />
					<farmer_full_name />
					<farmer_sex />
					<farmer_age />
					<member_since />
					<farmer_address />
					<crops />
					<corn_farmer />
					<rice_farmer />
					<other_farmer />
					<farmer_phone_number />
					<land_ownership />
					<own_arable_land />
					<rent_arable_land />
					<arable_land />
					<land_access />
				</data>
			</instance>
			<instance src="jr://instance/casedb" id="casedb" />
			<instance src="jr://instance/session" id="commcaresession" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/case_properties" nodeset="/data/case_properties" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/case_properties/farmer_full_name" nodeset="/data/case_properties/farmer_full_name" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/case_properties/cooperative_name" nodeset="/data/case_properties/cooperative_name" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/case_properties/farmer_gender" nodeset="/data/case_properties/farmer_gender" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/case_properties/farmer_age" nodeset="/data/case_properties/farmer_age" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/case_properties/farmer_land_ownership" nodeset="/data/case_properties/farmer_land_ownership" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/case_properties/farmer_crops" nodeset="/data/case_properties/farmer_crops" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/case_properties/farmer_phone_number" nodeset="/data/case_properties/farmer_phone_number" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/case_properties/farm_size" nodeset="/data/case_properties/farm_size" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/case_properties/farmer_address" nodeset="/data/case_properties/farmer_address" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/case_properties/land_ownership" nodeset="/data/case_properties/land_ownership" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/case_properties/corn_farmer" nodeset="/data/case_properties/corn_farmer" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/case_properties/rice_farmer" nodeset="/data/case_properties/rice_farmer" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/case_properties/other_farmer" nodeset="/data/case_properties/other_farmer" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/case_properties/cooperative_member_since" nodeset="/data/case_properties/cooperative_member_since" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/case_properties/arable_land" nodeset="/data/case_properties/arable_land" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/review_label" nodeset="/data/review_label" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/review_label/intro" nodeset="/data/review_label/intro" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/review_label/farmer_full_name" nodeset="/data/review_label/farmer_full_name" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/review_label/farmer_demographics_label" nodeset="/data/review_label/farmer_demographics_label" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/review_label/farmer_age_label" nodeset="/data/review_label/farmer_age_label" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/review_label/plot_size_label" nodeset="/data/review_label/plot_size_label" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/review_label/farmer_cooperative_membership" nodeset="/data/review_label/farmer_cooperative_membership" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/review_label/farmer_crops_label" nodeset="/data/review_label/farmer_crops_label" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/update_information" nodeset="/data/update_information" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer_first_name" nodeset="/data/farmer_first_name" type="xsd:string" vellum:relevant="selected(#form/update_information, 'name')" relevant="selected(/data/update_information, 'name')" required="true()" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer_last_name" nodeset="/data/farmer_last_name" type="xsd:string" vellum:relevant="selected(#form/update_information, 'name')" relevant="selected(/data/update_information, 'name')" required="true()" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer_full_name" nodeset="/data/farmer_full_name" vellum:calculate="concat(#form/farmer_first_name, ' ', #form/farmer_last_name)" calculate="concat(/data/farmer_first_name, ' ', /data/farmer_last_name)" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer_sex" nodeset="/data/farmer_sex" vellum:relevant="selected(#form/update_information, 'farmer_gender')" relevant="selected(/data/update_information, 'farmer_gender')" required="true()" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer_age" nodeset="/data/farmer_age" type="xsd:int" constraint=". >= 15 and . <= 100" jr:constraintMsg="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data/farmer_age-constraintMsg')" vellum:relevant="selected(#form/update_information, 'age')" relevant="selected(/data/update_information, 'age')" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/member_since" nodeset="/data/member_since" type="xsd:int" constraint=". > 1950 and . <= 2016" jr:constraintMsg="jr:itext('farmer/demographic_data/member_since-constraintMsg')" vellum:relevant="selected(#form/update_information, 'cooperative_member')" relevant="selected(/data/update_information, 'cooperative_member')" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer_address" nodeset="/data/farmer_address" type="xsd:string" vellum:relevant="selected(#form/update_information, 'address')" relevant="selected(/data/update_information, 'address')" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/crops" nodeset="/data/crops" vellum:relevant="selected(#form/update_information, 'crops')" relevant="selected(/data/update_information, 'crops')" required="true()" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/corn_farmer" nodeset="/data/corn_farmer" vellum:calculate="if(#form/crops = "corn", 1, 0)" calculate="if(/data/crops = "corn", 1, 0)" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/rice_farmer" nodeset="/data/rice_farmer" vellum:calculate="if(#form/crops = "rice", 1, 0)" calculate="if(/data/crops = "rice", 1, 0)" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/other_farmer" nodeset="/data/other_farmer" vellum:calculate="if(#form/crops = "other", 1, 0)" calculate="if(/data/crops = "other", 1, 0)" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/farmer_phone_number" nodeset="/data/farmer_phone_number" type="xsd:string" vellum:relevant="selected(#form/update_information, 'phone_number')" relevant="selected(/data/update_information, 'phone_number')" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/land_ownership" nodeset="/data/land_ownership" vellum:relevant="selected(#form/update_information, 'plot_size')" relevant="selected(/data/update_information, 'plot_size')" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/own_arable_land" nodeset="/data/own_arable_land" type="xsd:double" vellum:relevant="#form/land_ownership = '1'" relevant="/data/land_ownership = '1'" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/rent_arable_land" nodeset="/data/rent_arable_land" type="xsd:double" vellum:relevant="#form/land_ownership = '2'" relevant="/data/land_ownership = '2'" />

</h:html>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Remove Cooperative</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/B60B1EF8-EA5F-4F00-B2D7-BB0456783F3B" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Remove Cooperative">
					<remove_cooperative />
					<confirm_close />
					<not_removed_confirm />
				</data>
			</instance>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/remove_cooperative" nodeset="/data/remove_cooperative" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/confirm_close" nodeset="/data/confirm_close" vellum:relevant="#form/remove_cooperative = '1'" relevant="/data/remove_cooperative = '1'" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/not_removed_confirm" nodeset="/data/not_removed_confirm" vellum:relevant="#form/remove_cooperative = '2'" relevant="/data/remove_cooperative = '2'" />
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="remove_cooperative-label">
						<value>Would you like to remove this cooperative from your project?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="remove_cooperative-1-label">
						<value>Yes</value>
					</text>
					<text id="remove_cooperative-2-label">
						<value>No</value>
					</text>
					<text id="confirm_close-label">
						<value>This cooperative will be removed once you submit this form.</value>
					</text>
					<text id="not_removed_confirm-label">
						<value>Please exit this form. The cooperative will NOT be removed.</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<select1 vellum:ref="#form/remove_cooperative" ref="/data/remove_cooperative">
			<label ref="jr:itext('remove_cooperative-label')" />
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('remove_cooperative-1-label')" />
				<value>1</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('remove_cooperative-2-label')" />
				<value>2</value>
			</item>
		</select1>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/confirm_close" ref="/data/confirm_close" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('confirm_close-label')" />
		</trigger>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/not_removed_confirm" ref="/data/not_removed_confirm" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('not_removed_confirm-label')" />
		</trigger>
	</h:body>
</h:html>
